title: How to Create and Send Invoices with Wave
description: Free invoicing software that looks professional and lets customers pay online.
requirements: A customer to send your first invoice to

steps.title: Create a Wave account
steps.description: Go to waveapps.com and sign up for free.
substeps: Enter your email and create a password
Choose your business type and industry

steps.title: Add your business info
steps.description: This shows up on every invoice you send.
substeps: Upload your logo (optional but looks professional)
steps.tip: A logo makes your invoices look way more legitimate. Even a simple one works.

steps.title: Set up your services
steps.description: Create templates for the things you charge for.
substeps: Enter a name like 'Mulching Service' or 'HVAC Repair'
Set a default price (you can change it per invoice)

steps.title: Enable online payments
steps.description: Let customers pay by credit card right from the invoice.
substeps: Choose to accept credit cards (2.9% fee)
steps.tip: Customers pay 2x faster when they can pay online. Worth the small fee.

steps.title: Create your first invoice
substeps: Add your customer's name and email

successMessage: Your customer just got a professional invoice with a 'Pay Now' button! You'll get notified when they pay.
proTips: Set up recurring invoices for regular maintenance customers
Add payment terms like 'Due in 14 days' to set expectations
Wave also tracks expenses and does basic bookkeeping — all free
